thread.title: Life | Need some get up and go this morning? Starbucks release new 'Beast Mode Frappuccino'
thread.title_full: Life | Need some get up and go this morning? Starbucks release new 'Beast Mode Frappuccino' - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Life | Need some get up and go this morning? Starbucks release new 'Beast Mode Frappuccino'
text:
It's got protein powder in it - for realz. And, yep, that's raspberry drizzle right there... Inspired by NFL player Marshawn Lynch of the Seattle Seahawks, it also features a rake load of chocolate and mint.
According to the Starbucks website: "Lynch, sporting a Starbucks green apron in a test lab deep inside the company’s Seattle headquarters, began mixing Frappuccino flavor combinations that have never been tried before. As the Seattle Seahawks star sipped a double chocolate Frappuccino with added protein powder and some raspberry drizzle, he flashed a satisfied grin. Lynch was getting closer to the final blend for a new beverage that will take on his nickname - Beast Mode. “I’d drink this before a workout,” Lynch said. “You could get your buff on with this.”
The official recipe goes as follows: it's a "double mocha Frappuccino with a hint of mint and cream and just enough protein powder to unleash your inner Beast Mode. It’s topped with whipped cream, then finished with a purple berry drizzle and a sprinkle of matcha."
That BETTER be coming to our shores soon...
